chunk:
Concha Nacar Crema De Dia No.1 Day Face Cream

Brand: Conchanacar

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water, Glycerine, Stearic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Sulphated Castor Oil, Koh, Isopropyl Myristate, Oyster Shell

Directions: For best results first cleanse face with the Perlop Limpiadora Deep Cleansing Cream. Wipe face with wet washc

face with wet washcloth, pat dry and then apply Day Cream to face in a gentle circular upward motion until the cream is absorbed into the skin.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
